critique: The document is an executive order issued by President Trump regarding sanctions on Venezuela. It aims to address the national emergency declared in Executive Order 13692, focusing on actions by the Maduro regime. The order blocks property and interests of individuals operating in the Venezuelan economy, particularly those involved in corruption or undermining Venezuela's infrastructure. It also suspends the entry of individuals meeting these criteria into the United States. The order grants broad authority to the Secretaries of Treasury and State to implement these measures.
